dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: You are ready Leon, seek out the evil spirit and defeat him.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Yes Master Agnus, with the power of this new spell I am sure I will conquer the evil spirit.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: I can sense the presence of this evil, it must be somewhere in the town square.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Thank you, Master Agnus. I will head to the town square immediately.
